type.description: The type of giveaways to retrieve (e.g., game, loot, beta).

tools.name: peers
tools.description: Retrieves a list of company peers given a stock symbol.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for the company.

chain_slug.description: The slug identifier for the blockchain (e.g., 'ethereum' for Ethereum mainnet).

What is the T3MA for 'ETH/BTC' using a 1h interval and a time period of 14?

tools.name: t3ma
tools.description: Fetches the Triple Exponential Moving Average (T3MA) for a given financial instrument.

symbol.description: Instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., 'AAPL', 'EUR/USD', 'ETH/BTC').

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported intervals include '1min', '5min', '15min', '30min', '45min', '1h', '2h', '4h', '1day', '1week', and '1month'.

format.description: Format of the response data, either 'CSV' or 'JSON'. Default is 'json'.

v_factor.description: Volume factor used in the calculation of the T3MA.

series_type.description: Type of series to use in the calculation. Supported values are 'open', 'high', 'low', and 'close'. Default is 'close'.

outputsize.description: Number of data points to return. Default is 30.

time_period.description: Number of periods over which to calculate the T3MA. Default is 9.

tools.name: stock_v2_get_profile
tools.description: Retrieves the company profile information for a given performance ID using the RapidAPI Morning Star service.

performanceid.description: The performance ID of the stock, obtained from endpoints such as /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers.

input.content: You are a helpful AI assistant with access to various functions. When you need to use a function to answer a user's request, call the appropriate function with the correct arguments. You can call multiple functions if needed to fully address the user's query.
List titles originally aired on networks '1' and '8', released after 2010, sorted by release date in descending order.

tools.name: get_animes
tools.description: Retrieves a list of animes based on specified search criteria and filters from the RapidAPI Anime API.

year_greater.description: Find animes released after the specified year.

media_type.description: Filter by media type (e.g., music, tv, ona, ova, movie, special).

year_less.description: Find animes released before the specified year.

status.description: Filter by anime status (e.g., currently_airing, finished_airing, not_yet_aired).

q.description: Search for animes by title in English or Japanese.

sort.description: Specify sort order, True for ascending and False for descending.

fields.description: Specify the fields to return (e.g., id, title, main_picture, etc.).

year_equal.description: Filter by animes released in the specified year.

source.description: Filter by source material (e.g., manga, visual_novel, novel, etc.).

order.description: Order results by a specific field.

tools.name: list_titles
tools.description: Fetches a listing of titles that match specified parameters from the Watchmode API.

genres.description: Filter results to only include certain genre(s). Pass in a single genre ID or multiple comma-separated IDs. Default is '4,9'.

limit.description: Set how many titles to return per page. Default and maximum is 250.

source_ids.description: Filter the results to titles available on specific sources by passing individual IDs or multiple comma-separated IDs. Default is '23,206'. Note: Only a single region can be set if this is populated.

source_types.description: Filter results to only include titles available on specific types of sources (e.g., subscription, free). Default is 'sub,free'. Note: Only a single region can be set if this is populated.

types.description: Filter results to only include titles available on specific types of sources (e.g., subscription, free). Default is 'sub,free'. Note: Only a single region can be set if this is populated.

regions.description: Filter results to only include sources active in specific regions. Currently supported regions: US, GB, CA, AU. Default is 'US'. Note: Only a single region can be set if source_ids or source_types are populated.

sort_by.description: Sort order of results. Possible values include: relevance_desc, relevance_asc, popularity_desc, popularity_asc, release_date_desc, release_date_asc, title_desc, title_asc. Default is 'relevance_desc'.

page.description: Set the page of results to return. Default is 1.

network_ids.description: Filter results to titles that originally aired on specific TV networks by passing individual IDs or multiple comma-separated IDs. Default is '1,8,12'.

release_date_start.description: Filter results to only include titles released on or after a specific date. Format: YYYYMMDD. Default is 20010101.

release_date_end.description: Filter results to only include titles released on or before a specific date. Format: YYYYMMDD. Default is 20201211.
